titleStmt.title: A right pithy, pleasant, and merry comedy, entituled, Gammer Gurton's needle made by Mr. S. ...
Gammer Gurton's needle
titleStmt.author: S., Mr., Mr. of Art.
Stevenson, William, d. 1575.
Bridges, John, d. 1618.
Still, John, 1543?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson, and are to be sold by Nath. Brook ..., Francis Kirkman ..., Tho. Johnson ..., Henry Marsh ...,

notesStmt.note: "Played on the stage near a hundred years ago in Christs College in Cambridge."
Formerly ascribed to John Still, Bishop of Bath and Wells, or to John Bridges, Bishop of Oxford, but now attributed to William Stevenson of Christ's college, Cambridge. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
